name: Delivery without indorsement:  right to compel indorsement
text: §490:7-506    The transferee of a negotiable document of title has a specifically enforceable right to have his transferor supply any necessary indorsement but the transfer becomes a negotiation only as of the time the indorsement is supplied. [L 1965, c 208, §7-506; HRS §490:7-506]
